metro.GameScreen.MainView.PlayingField

Class PlayingField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
        • metro.GameScreen.MainView.PlayingField.PlayingField

  • public class PlayingField
extends GameScreen
    The playing field is the area where trains are driving, the stations are placed and the nodes live peaceful together with the tracks and train lines.
    Author:
    hauke
